Interface SuccessManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameSuccess, ScenarioSuccess
public sealed interface SuccessManager permits ScenarioSuccess, GameSuccess
The SuccessManager interface defines methods for managing and checking player achievements in different game scenarios. This interface is designed to handle success-related operations, such as: - Checking achievements based on predefined success maps. - Reading and writing success data to/from files. - Building detailed logs of player successes.

  • Method Details

    • checkSuccesses

      List<String> checkSuccesses(Map<Integer,String> successMap)
      Checks the successes achieved by the player based on a map of success IDs and descriptions.
      Parameters:
      successMap - A map where keys are success IDs and values are descriptions of the successes.
      Returns:
      A list of strings representing the successes achieved by the player.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the successMap is null.

    • stockSuccess

      default void stockSuccess(String gameMode, ScoringStrategy scoringStrategy, Player winner)
      Stores the achievements of the winning player into a file, based on the game mode and scoring strategy.
      Parameters:
      gameMode - The game mode (e.g., graphical or terminal).
      scoringStrategy - The scoring strategy used in the game.
      winner - The winning player whose achievements are being recorded.

    • readSuccessMapFromFile

      default Map<Integer,String> readSuccessMapFromFile(String filename)
      Reads a success map from a file and parses it into a Map<Integer, String>.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file containing the success map.
      Returns:
      A map of success IDs and descriptions.

    • writeSuccessesToFile

      default void writeSuccessesToFile(String filename, Map<Integer,String> successMap, String gameMode, ScoringStrategy scoringStrategy, Player player)
      Writes the achievements of a player to a file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the final we rite in
      successMap - A map of success IDs and descriptions.
      gameMode - graphical or terminal
      scoringStrategy - The scoring strategy used in the game.
      player - The player whose achievements are being recorded.
      Throws:
      UncheckedIOException - If an error occurs while writing to the file.
